 NOTES: We decided to make a "v2" but now with english subtitles.
        This are not homemade made automatically from autotranslators
        but the retail ones that came with the Full-Bluray.
        Also they are not hardcoded, you can disable-enable whenever you like.

 
 Playing the subtitles: You dont know how to activate or play the subtitles?

 Its easy.
 
 Just play the .avi file using VLC, and drag the .srt file (inside the Subtitles foder)
 to the VLC window.

 And pretty much thats it. :)

PLOT


When a band of brutal gangsters led by a crooked property developer make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.
